data.text: @LankyObserver It breaks my heart when i see kids used as leverage. I speak from my own experience on this one...

@AfricanSoul11 I think it is largely a human problem. Kids are often weaponised in romantic conflict. With that said, a woman's bond with a child is probably stronger on many levels, which is why very few mothers can be ruthlessly unfeeling with their children.

@LankyObserver I do believe so. What I would like to understand is why most fathers let whatever they feel towards the mother affect their relationship with the children. Perhaps as a man, you might have some insight for me... 😁
@LankyObserver Mummy duty 😩

@nanahbabez_4965 😂😂

You should be sleeping.
@LankyObserver Too late, Done 😂😂😂

@namzy10 😂

Good night Namzy.
@AfricanSoul11 Do you imagine that's what is happening in this case?

@LankyObserver Well, when those parties take each other to court I think it surpasses the pinch of salt. My own observation is that men tend to link child support and parent to the emotion they feel towards the mother.

@namzy10 😂😂

We need to sign a contract first. If it is not on paper, it isn't a deal.

@AfricanSoul11 Emotions run high in almost all divorces. Lots of mud slinging happens. 

My rule of thumb is to take anything either party says about the other with a pinch of salt.

@LankyObserver I actually am a little interested in this one. He is reportedly not chipping in enough for child support. This seems to be the same story for divorcees world wide. Gets me thinking though... Do people just forget about their kids or what?

@namzy10 Eh? Brad Pitt is not a sex symbol? I thought ladies have always loved him? 

Oh, I'm cute. Trust me. Very cute. Would produce receipts right now, but I'm not ready for the havoc to be wrecked on my DMs. They would be ungovernable. 😉

@mitch_hamalwa 😂😂

Good night.

@nanahbabez_4965 😂

Promise you won't slide into my DMs? Not sure you will resist it.
@LankyObserver Unfortunately not... Please do

@nanahbabez_4965 Lol. You didn't know? 

I could produce receipts even.

Admittedly, this is a pretty cold thought. Maybe even bordering on the insensitive. But hey, we are talking about an industry that manufactures rivalries, sells nudes and tapes depicting all manner of lascivious activity for notoriety and fame.

Wouldn't be the worst we've seen.
@LankyObserver Good to know
@nanahbabez_4965 Yes. I'm cute.

I'm not as interested in the actual drama as I am in the thought of making a franchise of their hit movie - Mr. & Mrs Smith; on which set the romance reportedly began.

Think of the interest (and millions) a sequel with real animosity between them this time would generate.
@LankyObserver And I?? 🤔
